content: Hello there,i am having an issue joining in the IRC channel for OpenScad.Is there any way i can figure it out.
I don't know about their IRC channel, but there is a contact address on their homepage. In addition, you can leave a comment at one of their Github issues.

Daniel Rossberg said:

I don't know about their IRC channel, but there is a contact address on their homepage. In addition, you can leave a comment at one of their Github issues.

Thank You :innocent:

I am currently going through
1.Arbalest and MooseCodebase,trying to understand the previously implemented functionality.
2.Also going through OpenScad.
Looking forward to work.
However, I know about 1. Arbalest and MOOSE :wink:

Daniel Rossberg said:

However, I know about 1. Arbalest and MOOSE :wink:

Yep,Looking forward to it.
